content:
A group of invaders in the Bakhmut direction hit the pilots of the Black Raven unit of a separate mechanized brigade "Cold Yar".

AppropriateThe video was placedLand troops of the Armed Forces.

The invaders had to storm Ukrainian positions, but instead hid under the previously broken BMP. But Black Raven found the enemy and destroyed the whole group.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlier, the hostile BMP was crushed by the warriors of the princely brigade.
title: Cold Yar fighters destroyed a group of guns
description: The corresponding video was posted by the Armed Forces Land. The invaders were to storm Ukrainian ...
author: Army Inform
